SEARCH
Package org.apache.cayenne.configuration.rop.client

Class ClientConstants

java.lang.Object
org.apache.cayenne.configuration.rop.client.ClientConstants
public class ClientConstants extends Object
Defines the names of runtime properties and named collections used in DI modules related to ROP client.
Since:
4.0
